comment: Intregrated use of Web Components to create a Dynamic Chart
This Tutorial will require some more Web Components in addition to the Vega Charting Component...
Let's review some work we did in another Tutorial to use as a base for this one...
Here we separate the Chart Specification from the Chart Data...
Vega Specs CAN include embedded associated with Datasets...
Let's bring in the Digital Clock Component and tell it to inform us of the Current Time every second...
You can easily extract the Payload from a Web Component Event into a Data Tile...
Let's expose some Properties of a Data Object and BIND them into the Chart Data Function...
Let's prepare the Bar Chart Data to render as a Digital Clock...
We now programmatically integrate the Dynamic Data from the Digital Clock Event into the Data for the Chart...
Note how the Bar Chart now changes everh second with the Data emitted by the Digital Clock...
Now we'll see how to add the Digital Clock Web Component to the Visible Screen...
Now we Save, Publish, and Preview our work to see Dynamic Data rendering in a Bar Chart
